Message.Title: DOD VETS get furloughed this week for 11 weeks, Wall Street say they support VETS , but they don't
Message.Msg: We all know that Wall Street runs Congress what a slap in the face to our DOD VETS to furlough them the week after the 4th of July, If GM would have paid the money back we won't need to furlough our DOD VETS
Buy $200 calls and sell twice as many $210 calls. A much better trade that costs half as much. The stock would have to rise above $220 to lose money and the downside risk is much smaller.
